title: DevOps/SRE Interview Guide
description: Demonstrate infrastructure, automation, and reliability expertise.

content.text: DevOps/SRE interviews test your infrastructure knowledge, automation skills, and ability to build reliable, scalable systems. Expect hands-on troubleshooting scenarios and system design questions.

**What interviewers assess:**

- Linux/Unix systems knowledge
- Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- CI/CD and automation
- Monitoring, alerting, and incident response
- Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, etc.)

**Typical DevOps/SRE interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Technical phone screen** (60 min) - Troubleshooting or coding
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (4-5 hours):
   - System design/architecture round
   - Troubleshooting/debugging scenario
   - Coding/automation round
   - Behavioral round
For troubleshooting scenarios, explain your methodology: how you'd gather information, form hypotheses, and systematically narrow down the issue.

items.text: Practice system design for scalable infrastructure
Brush up on networking (DNS, TCP/IP, load balancing)
Prepare incident response stories with postmortem insights
Practice scripting in Python or Bash
